name: LagoonRadio
0:
”Alexa, open lagoon radio”

skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: lagoon radio
Developer Terms of Use
des:
LagoonRadio™ is the official radio of the Diocese of Lagos, Church of Nigeria (Anglican Communion). We broadcast live from the Archbishop's Palace, Marina, Lagos, Nigeria. The launch of the online radio station coincides with the 100 years of the existence of the Diocese.

We live-stream spirit-filled, educative and entertaining contents round-the-clock. Our program includes (but not limited to) live broadcasting of church programs, daily sermon, devotionals, lagoon praise, talk shows, hymnals, all-round news, and musical renditions

The shows and programs are highly interactive, kingdom-driven, and very addictive. Join us via the app and remain blessed.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
